text: The is a diesel multiple unit (DMU) train type operated by Japanese National Railways in Japan since November 1986, and later operated by Kyushu Railway Company (JR Kyushu) and Shikoku Railway Company (JR Shikoku) ==Fleet== , JR Kyushu operates 20 185 series vehicles, and JR Shikoku operates 32. ==See also== * Joyful Train ==References== ==External links== * 185 series details on JR Shikoku website 185 series 185 series 185 series Category:Train-related introductions in 1986
title: KiHa 185 series
